4.14.19  5:52 pm   I'm at the point in my music career where loads of people are asking for my help because I'm good.

      I feel like it's my duty as an instrumentalist to take all the gigs but at the same time I just wanna work on all my own stuff all the time because that's actually what I enjoy doing. Problem is, I'm actually getting some decent gigs in the session kinda world so I feel like maybe I should stick at it. Should I keep making art I like for less people or follow the career developments?
